name: Balls Primitive: Bubble Pop
description:
Balls Primitive: Bubble Pop is a fun game. Play this game can train your brain and finger. Unlike word search game, suitable for all countries. It's a mind game and It's very cool, popular for a long time. No matter the elderly, children, women, housewives or beautiful girls all love. Now, we are coming back. Let immerse yourself in incredibly interesting world.
Features:
- Levels of challenging puzzles and new ones coming out all the time
- Stunning and fascinating new maps
- Lots of amazing props
- Fresh and bright bubble graphics
- Relaxing background music
- Easy and fun to play, hard to master
